messages.title: MAKE YOUR VOICE HEARD
messages.content: This upcoming election on May 7th could be the most important of the last 70 years and your vote really will make a difference! Only the Green Party offers a real alternative to the broken politics of the past.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Green Party is advocating for a fairer vote system by bringing the transport system back into public control, and a vote for a more sustainable future.
They aim to ensure that everyone has access to secure jobs that pay at least the Living Wage.
The Green Party intends to build an economy that works for the common good, not just the privileged few.

mentions.candidate: The leaflet encourages the reader to vote for Kevin Warnes, the Green Party candidate for Shipley.

issues.economy: The Green Party wants to build an economy that works for the common good by making sure everyone has access to jobs that pay at least the Living Wage.
issues.health: The Green Party has a goal of protecting our NHS.

contactInformation.address: Bradford Green Party, 37 Moorhead Terrace, Shipley BD18 4LB

images.caption: Bradford Green Party promotional material image with crowd and city hall.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet begins with a personalized address to 'Elesha' and emphasizes the importance of the coming election. It mentions that the Green Party sees an increase in membership and describes itself as a real alternative to broken politics. It offers a brief summary of key policies without going into detail about other traditional issue areas.
